## PatchOperation type

Manage patch operation input object, usually passed in an array of operations

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PatchOperation = {
    op: 'add' | 'replace' | 'remove';
    path: string;
    value: Record<string, unknown> | Record<string, unknown>[] | string | null;
};
```
